title: Data Scientist
description: Analyzes and interprets complex data to help organizations make better decisions.

title: Backend Developer
description: Builds and maintains the server-side logic of web applications.

title: Frontend Developer
description: Implements the user interface and user experience of web applications.

title: Full-Stack Developer
description: Works on both the frontend and backend of a web application.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Works with developers and IT staff to oversee code releases and deployments.

title: Product Manager
description: Defines the why, when, and what of the product that the engineering team builds.
